sect2.title: Merge Layer Groups

indexterm.tertiary: Merge all layers in the selected layer groups

sect2.para: The Merge Layer Groups command merges all the layers in the selected layer groups, taking into account the various properties of each group, such as its opacity and layer mode.

The resulting merged layers will be in Normal mode, and will inherit the opacity of the layer groups. If the layers inside a group are not opaque, or if they are in some mode other than Normal, then this command will generally change the appearance of the image.

note.para: This command is only visible if the selected layers contain at least one layer group.

listitem.para:
From the main menu through
Layer Merge Layer Groups .

From the Layers Dialog, you can access it through the Merge Layer Groups command of its context menu, or by Shift clicking on the
Merge Down
icon button on the bottom of that dialog.
